AuditAssistant_ChatBot.name: AI Conversation Bot - Contract Intelligence System
AuditAssistant_ChatBot.description: Developed an AI document analysis system integrating LangChain RAG with Neo4j Graph RAG for contract review and compliance evaluation. Features entity extraction with provenance tracking, hybrid search, and ASC606/SOX compliance frameworks.

LLM-Journey_2.0.name: LLM Learning Repository - Comprehensive LLM Implementation Guide
LLM-Journey_2.0.description: A comprehensive learning repository covering essential Large Language Model (LLM) concepts, implementations, and practical applications. Features hands-on notebooks and tutorials for chunking strategies, RAG systems, fine-tuning techniques, and AI agent development.
features: Advanced chunking strategies (character, recursive, semantic, agentic)
Basic RAG with web scraping and PDF processing
Advanced fine-tuning with TRL and SFT
SQL agents for database query generation
Competitor analysis agents with web scraping

AnomalyDetection_JournalEntries.name: Journal Entries - Anomaly Detection System
AnomalyDetection_JournalEntries.description: Developed a machine learning-based anomaly detection system for journal entries using isolation forests and statistical analysis. Implemented automated flagging of unusual transactions with 95% accuracy.

Model_FineTuning_TransactionMatching.name: Reconciliation - Transaction Matching - LLM Fine-Tuning System (WIP)
Model_FineTuning_TransactionMatching.description: Fine-tuned Mistral 7B LLM with LoRA/QLoRA for automated financial transaction reconciliation, matching sub-ledger to GL closing balances by Company Code, G/L Account, and Profit Center. Targets 90%+ accuracy and 80-90% manual effort reduction.

IC_Automation.name: Inter-Company Automation (End-to-End)
IC_Automation.description: Built an end-to-end intercompany automation framework for SAP-based financial reconciliation. The system automates SAP data extraction, to final reporting
features: Automated SAP ledger data extraction via VBScript
Withholding Tax and GST liabilities computation

Working-with-PDF-Files.name: Working With PDF Files
Working-with-PDF-Files.description: Reading Bill of entry PDF files using regex Python, merge operations and more.

ML-Classification_Tutorial.name: Advanced Fraud Detection Pipeline
ML-Classification_Tutorial.description: Engineered a production-grade machine learning system for financial fraud detection on 6M+ transactions. Implements a modular pipeline with 10+ classification algorithms, advanced feature engineering, and automated drift detection for robust performance.

ML_Clustering_Tutorial.name: E-commerce Customer Segmentation - Clustering ML Pipeline
ML_Clustering_Tutorial.description: Built an industry-ready unsupervised learning pipeline for customer segmentation on 1M+ e-commerce events. Implements hybrid clustering approaches with stability analysis and advanced feature engineering to identify actionable customer personas.
features: Advanced feature engineering (RFM, Behavioral, Categorical Embeddings)

Electric_Motor_Temp_Prediction.name: Electric Motor Temperature Prediction System
Electric_Motor_Temp_Prediction.description: End-to-end machine learning regression pipeline for predicting internal motor component temperatures. Designed for production with modular architecture, preventing data leakage via group-based validation, and automated monitoring.

ML-TimeSeries_Tutorial.name: Advanced Time Series Forecasting Pipeline
ML-TimeSeries_Tutorial.description: Comprehensive production-ready time series framework implementing classical (ARIMA/ETS), ML (XGBoost/RF), and multivariate Deep Learning (LSTM/GRU) models. Features automated pipelines for stationarity testing, concept drift detection, and recursive feature elimination.
